snippet.title: Official OneBit Adventure Trailer
snippet.description:
In this game, you adventure the lands to fight scary (but cute!) enemies to level up your stats, and discover the delicious loot scattered throughout the lands. Choose from a variety of classes that range in different abilities in this epic dungeon crawler experience. Currently in beta, there is much to discover and plenty more to come this game. Some big features yet to come are epic boss fights, quest lines, and more.

Available on the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GalacticSlice.OneBitAdventure
Available on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/onebit-adventure/id1481297211

OneBit Music: https://soundcloud.com/osk-music/sets/onebit-ost/s-O2nfk
